tour.title: Welcome to asyncz
tour.content: This tour shows branch managers and reception staff how to manage bookings, services, and customers in asyncz.

tour.title: Main Navigation
tour.content: Use the header to reach the branch tools and other features you’re allowed to use.

tour.title: Branch Dashboard
tour.content: Get an overview of today’s bookings, staff activity, and key branch metrics.

tour.title: Calendar
tour.content: View and manage all appointments for your branch, assign experts, and keep schedules up to date.

tour.title: Branch Settings
tour.content: Edit your branch details, working hours, and availability settings.

tour.title: Team Members
tour.content: Manage experts assigned to this branch and adjust their availability.

tour.title: Services
tour.content: Control which services are offered in this branch and update their details or pricing.

tour.title: Customers
tour.content: Check customer profiles, bookings, and contact details relevant to your branch.

tour.title: Blacklist
tour.content: Block or allow customers for your branch if needed.

tour.title: Feedback & Support
tour.content: Send suggestions or contact support for branch-related questions.

tour.title: Replay Tour
tour.content: Click here anytime to restart this branch manager guide.
